topic.title: Preface
topic.shortdesc: This book explains each tasks separately. You can jump in anywhere, get the information you need, and complete your work.

note.b: THIS SAMPLE USES THE DEPRECATED DEMO VERSION OF BOOKMAP. There is now a standard version of bookmap with several important differences. As soon as you are able, you should switch to the official bookmap. A sample is located at samples/taskbook.ditamap

body.p: You can use this book to master tasks if you wish or just keep it handy as a resource so you can focus on other issues.
